OneLineDescription: Customizable Archery Physics for any load order.
LongDescription: Archery physics the way you want, for any load order. Allows modifying the speed, gravity, impact force, noise level, and flags of projectiles, as well as removing auto-aim and fixing numerous bugs. (For example: The "Ninja Dodge" bug that has existed since launch, arrows colliding with the air in front of you, and more!) Comes with a complete settings menu that allows you to control everything.
